import { useQuery } from "@apollo/client" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { ALL_BOOKS, ALL_BOOKS_BY_GENRE, USER_INFO } from "../queries" const Recommend = () => { const result = useQuery(USER_INFO) console.log(result) const favGenre = result.data.favoriteGenre const booksByGenre = useQuery(ALL_BOOKS_BY_GENRE, { variables: { favGenre }, skip: !favGenre, }) console.log(books) const books = booksByGenre.data.allBooks return( {books && books.map((a) => ( ))}
author published
{a.title} {a.author.name} {a.published}
) } export default Recommend
